item.title: Clone git repository only some directories
item.description:
• First, do:
git clone --depth 1 [repo-root] [local_dir]
  • Then:
cd [local_dir]
  • And lastly:
git filter-branch --prune-empty --subdirectory-filter [repo-subdir] HEAD

item.title: Nested KVM
item.description:
• Enable the setting for Nested KVM
cat <<EOF > /etc/modprobe.d/kvm-nested.conf
options kvm_intel nested=1
EOF

modprobe -r kvm_intel

modprobe kvm_intel

cat /sys/module/kvm_intel/parameters/nested
  • Edit the configuration of a virtual machine you’d want to set nested
virsh edit {DOMAIN_NAME}/{DOMAIN_ID}
